subs.text: Everybody -- thank you for the excellent help in testing this code. It was a complicated corner-turn, and it seems to work, so I stopped the test and switched the main page over to the new system, and tonight the emails will go out using the new code.
Now if you go to scripting.com/email/ and subscribe, as I hope you will, you will actually subscribe for real. The unsub link will be at the bottom of each email.
